name: Wayfinder - LostFoxGames
description:
A game based on finding your way around without guidance or a map. Your goal is to navigate the strange land, searching for the lost power crystals in order to power the portal and escape. Challenge yourself to see how fast and efficiently you can do so!

Made during Alternative game development during the Spring 2021 Semester at the University of Utah. Made by Sidhee Kame, Nicholas Khor, Micky Linhan Wang, and Cameron Pink.
